mapper.insert: INSERT INTO company_detail (com_no, introduction, img_url, pension, sectors, history, ideal_talent, foundation, amount, url) VALUES (#{com_no},#{introduction},#{img_url},#{pension},#{sectors},#{history}, #{ideal_talent},#{foundation},#{amount},#{url});
mapper.select: SELECT com_detail_no FROM company_detail WHERE com_no= #{com_no}
SELECT recruit_no, title FROM recruit WHERE com_no = #{com_no};
SELECT mem_name FROM member WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no};
